original_title: No change in LAUGFS Gas prices
original_body_lines: The LAUGFS Gas Company announced today that there will be no change in the retail price of their cylinders of domestic LP gas even though the gas price in the world market has increased.
While issuing a statement, they said due to the high demand for energy, supply chain complications, and ground politics, the LP gas price in the global market is increasing.
Even though the global price is on the increase, the LAUGFS Gas Company will be providing LP gas at a considerable price.

The company assures its customers that they will continue to monitor the global market situation closely and adjust their prices accordingly in the future, should the market conditions allow it. (Chatuanga Pradeep Samarawickrama)
